thread.title: Ms. Got it Going On
thread.title_full: Elevate Styles reviewed by Ms. Got it Going On

author: Ms. Got it Going On
title: Ms. Got it Going On
text: I ordered the wig Jodi, it was easy to place the order, which is great, I like the email alerts regarding the tracking and confirmation of delivery. I received it within 3 days, very impressive, it was just as advertised by reviews and U tube I was not disappointed when I tried it on . I received so many compliments. I am a professional 65 year old and it makes me look a lot younger, I have no cons. I highly recommend this site to anyone that needs to continue to buy wigs because they make the outfit your wearing and they serve as great protective styles for your hair ,they save time getting ready for work and play and money from the high cost of going to the Beauty Salons. LONG LIVE THE WIG !!! and Elevated Styles too of course!
